title: Treatment - Wikipedia
cleaned_text: Treatment Treatment may refer to: ["Treatment" (song)](/wiki/Treatment_(song)), a 2012 song by Labrinth [Film treatment](/wiki/Film_treatment), a prose telling of a story intended to be turned into a screenplay American drama television series [In Treatment (Italian TV series)](/wiki/In_Treatment_(Italian_TV_series)), an Italian drama television series [National treatment](/wiki/National_treatment), an economic concept focused on grantings to foreigners of rights similar to those of domestic nationals [Silent treatment](/wiki/Silent_treatment), a form of social rejection [The Treatment (disambiguation)](/wiki/The_Treatment_(disambiguation)) [Treatment group](/wiki/Treatment_group), the collection of items or individuals receiving the same treatment in an experiment [Window treatment](/wiki/Window_treatment), any of various styling choices specific to the interiors of windows [All pages with titles beginning with Treatment](/wiki/Special:PrefixIndex/Treatment) [All
